retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The Datasource contains all your personal information relating to your use of Instagram. Do not change the composition of the folders and files within them. File zip size shall not exceed 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Follow the guide at this link
Done, wait an email confirmation with attached data
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Done, wait an email confirmation with attached data

retrievingSteps.description: Done, wait an email confirmation with attached data
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Done, wait an email confirmation with attached data

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: La Datasource contiene tutte le tue informazioni personali inerenti al tuo utilizzo di Instagram. Non modificare la composizione delle cartelle e dei file al loro interno. La dimensione del file Zip non deve superare i 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Segui la guida a questo link
Inserisci la tua password di Instagram
Finito, attendi l'email di conferma con i tuoi dati
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Finito, attendi l'email di conferma con i tuoi dati

retrievingSteps.description: Tap su Download delle tue informazioni
Inserisci la tua password di Instagram
Finito, attendi l'email di conferma con i tuoi dati
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Finito, attendi l'email di conferma con i tuoi dati

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The Datasource contains all your personal information relating to your use of Facebook. Do not change the composition of the folders and files within them. File zip size shall not exceed 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Select Format: JSON, Media Quality: High and Data Range: All Time
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Select Format JSON, Media Quality High and Data Range All time

retrievingSteps.description: Scroll down at the bottom of the page and click Request a download bottom
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Scroll down at the bottom of the page and click on Request a download bottom

retrievingSteps.description: Scroll down at the bottom of the page and click Request a download bottom
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Scroll down at the bottom of the page and click on Request a download bottom

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: La Datasource contiene tutte le tue informazioni personali inerenti al tuo utilizzo di Facebook. Non modificare la composizione delle cartelle e dei file al loro interno. La dimensione del file Zip non deve superare i 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Seleziona Formato: JSON, Media Quality: Alto ed Intervallo di date: Tutti i miei dati
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Seleziona Formato JSON, Media Quality Alto ed Intervallo di date Sempre

retrievingSteps.description: Scrolla fino a fondo pagina e clicca sul pulsante 'Richiedi download'

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The Datasource contains all your personal information relating to your use of Amazon. Do not change the composition of the folders and files within them. File zip size shall not exceed 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Select "Request All Your Data" from the drop-down menu
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Select Request All Your Data from the drop-down menu

retrievingSteps.description: Check your email address, find the last amazon's email and click on "Confirm Data Request"
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Check your Email Address, find the last Amazon's Email and click on Confirm Data Request

retrievingSteps.description: Once you receive the files list, download and zip all of them into one single zip file
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Once you receive the files list,download and zip all of them into one single zip file

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: La Datasource contiene tutte le tue informazioni personali inerenti al tuo utilizzo di Amazon. Non modificare la composizione delle cartelle e dei file al loro interno

retrievingSteps.description: Seleziona "Request All Your Data" dal menu a tendina
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Seleziona Request All Your Data dal menu a tendina

retrievingSteps.description: Controlla il tuo indirizzo email, trova l'ultima email di Amazon e clicca su "Confirm Data Request"
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Controlla il tuo Indirizzo Email, trova l'ultima Email di Amazon e clicca su Confirm Data Request

retrievingSteps.description: Una volta ricevuta la lista dei file, scaricali tutti e zippali in un unico file zip
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Una volta ricevuta la lista dei file, scaricali tutti e zippali in un unico file zip

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The Datasource contains all your personal information relating to your use of Google. Do not change the composition of the folders and files within them. File zip size shall not exceed 2 GB.

retrievingSteps.description: Set your Google Account Preferred Language to English (United Kingdom) at this link: https://myaccount.google.com/language
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Set your Google Account Preferred Language to English (United Kingdom) at this link

retrievingSteps.description: Unpin "Drive" and "Google Photos" from the list
Select "Export once" from Frequency menu, ".zip" and "2 GB" from File type & size menu
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Select Export once from Frequency menu, .zip and 2 GB from File type & size menu

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: La Datasource contiene tutte le tue informazioni personali inerenti al tuo utilizzo di Google. Non modificare la composizione delle cartelle e dei file al loro interno

retrievingSteps.description: Cambia la lingua preferita del tuo Account Google in English (United Kingdom) a questo link link: https://myaccount.google.com/language
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Cambia la Lingua Preferita del tuo Account Google in English (United Kingdom) a questo link link

retrievingSteps.description: Seleziona "Esporta un archivio" dal menu Frequenza, ".zip" and "2 GB" dal menu Tipo di file e dimensioni
retrievingSteps.attributeDescription: Seleziona Esporta un archivio dal menu Frequenza, .zip and 2 GB dal menu Tipo di file e dimensioni

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The file contains all data about your Shopify business' customers. Do not invalidate the content or the name of the file.

retrievingSteps.description: Go to the Customers page and click Export
Select All customers and Plain CSV file

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The file contains all about your Shopify business' purchased data (orders). Do not invalidate the content or the name of the file.

retrievingSteps.description: Go to the Orders page and click Export
Select All orders and Plain CSV file

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The file contains all data about your Shopify business' products. Do not invalidate the content or the name of the file.

retrievingSteps.description: Go to the Products page and click Export
Select All products and Plain CSV file

retrievingProcedures.descriptionText: The file contains all data about your Shopify business' discounts codes. Do not invalidate the content or the name of the file.

retrievingSteps.description: Go to the Discounts page and click Export
Select All discounts codes and Plain CSV file
